name: Foundations Of The Slay
description:
FOUNDATIONS OF THE SLAY - An MCR Return Era themed dress-up game

Ever wanted to help Gerard Way pick the worst possible tour outfit? Well boy(gn) do I have the game for you.

Disclaimer: This is was just a personal side project done for fun, please don't take it too seriously. Just think of it like interactive fanart.

Everything here is most of what was worn on the EU leg of the Return tour in 2021, featuring such iconic outfits like Meta Man, clown and short shorts.

Notes

  • If you're using mobile, the aspect ratio will go a bit weird but you can still play!!
  • There is no sound, I assume whoever plays this will have MCR playing on spotify so you won't need any extra background noise
  • I am neither a professional developer or an artist, so there will be bugs and some of the art will be ugly - I'm just one person doing my thing as a hobbyist. I got lazy so I probably missed a lot of things or I couldn't find good reference pics.

Credits:

This amazing artwork by @the-ria as a big inspiration

MCRchive Dropbox by https://themychemicalromancearchive.tumblr.com/ for reference images

Game-Icons.net

Fripple Rats discord server for helping me test this

Gerard Way for packing a whole Party City into their tour wardrobe

Find me on tumblr
